title: Adsorption mechanisms of short-chain and ultrashort-chain PFAS on anion exchange resins and activated carbon
content:
Environ. Sci.: Water Res. Technol., 2024, Accepted Manuscript
DOI: 10.1039/D3EW00959A, Paper

Short-chain and ultrashort-chain per-/polyfluoroalkyl substances (PFAS) have become ubiquitous in aquatic environments worldwide, and their concentrations are rising. Studies have shown adsorption on activated carbon (AC) and anion exchange resins...
